mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT ( COMMENT_SEQ , CONTENT , CREATED_DATE , MEMBER_SEQ , BOARD_SEQ ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('COMMENT_SEQ') , #{content} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{memberSeq} , #{boardDto.boardSeq})

INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT_REPLY ( REPLY_SEQ , CONTENT , CREATED_DATE , MEMBER_SEQ , BOARD_SEQ , PARENT_COMMENT_SEQ ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('REPLY_SEQ') , #{commentDto.content} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{commentDto.memberSeq} , #{boardSeq} , #{parentCommentSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_SEQ, C.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as CREATED_DATE, C.MEMBER_SEQ, C.BOARD_SEQ, M.MEMBER_ID FROM TB_COMMENT C LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE C.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY C.CREATED_DATE ASC
